name: woobly
description: This is the build tool for Woobly and its standard plug-ins.

scripts.test: rimraf @woobly/**/*.js build/**/*.js @woobly/**/*.d.ts build/**/*.d.ts && tsc && node build && nyc --check-coverage --all --exclude "**/*-tests.*" --exclude "build/**/*" --lines 100 --functions 100 --branches 100 --statements 100 jasmine --config=jasmine.json
